text: allahu parayum: ninnalkkumumpe kalinnupeaya jinnukalilum manusyarilum petta samuhannaleateappam ninnalum narakattiyil pravesikkuka. orea sanghavum atil pravesikkumpeal tannalute mungamikalaya sanghatte sapiccukeantirikkum. annane avareakkeyum avite orumiccukutiyal avarile pingamikal tannalute mungamikalekkuricc parayum: "nannalute natha! ivaran nannale vali pilappiccat. atinal ivarkku ni iratti narakasiksa nalkename.” allahu arulum: "ellavarkkum iratti siksayunt. pakse; ninnalariyunnillennumatram.”
